DOC.brief_summary: The study is conducted to examine the safety and efficacy of a new infant formula and its effects on the gastrointestinal tolerance in infants suffering from colic. Primary hypothesis to be tested is: an infant formula with optimized composition improves colicky symptoms compared to a standard formula.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Safety and Efficacy of New Infant Formula in Infantile Colic
